items.summary: Hide the Master Presentation section video upload functionality by commenting out or conditionally disabling the MasterVideoUploader component rendering in frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx without deleting the code

Hide the Master Presentation section video player functionality by commenting out or conditionally disabling the MasterPresentationPlayer component rendering in frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx without deleting the code

Hide backend video endpoints by commenting out or conditionally disabling the video-related public functions in backend/main.mo (initVideo, uploadChunk, finalizeVideo, getMasterVideo, getVideoMetadata) without deleting the code

Replace the Master Presentation section content in frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx with a static image display component that renders the generated forensic anthropology themed image from frontend/public/assets/generated/forensic-clock-hero.dim_1200x600.png
